articles.description: Zlatan Ibrahimovic has been ruled out of the Serie A clash between Milan and Juventus on Thursday (AEDT).

The 39-year-old striker has been sidelined since being substituted in the 3-1 win at Napoli on November 23.

articles.description: Arsenal’s Folarin Balogun has been shortlisted for December 2020’s Premier League 2 Player of the Month award alongside Chelsea’s Faustino Anjorin, and Southampton’s Nathan Tella.
